title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI Code to Production: Context Matters (NTA404)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI代码到生产：上下文很重要 (NTA404)
abstract: Why does AI-generated code break in production? Missing context. This interactive Code Talk transforms basic AI outputs into robust AWS solutions through strategic context injection. Watch live coding evolve generic "create an API" prompts into production-ready serverless architecture. Discover how business context, technical constraints, and AWS best practices dramatically improve AI results. Learn how development teams are shifting from code reviewers to context architects. Leave with actionable frameworks for prompt engineering, quality gates, and team dynamics that transform AI from development liability into strategic AWS advantage. Stop fighting AI-generated code—start directing it.
abstract_cn: 为什么AI生成的代码在生产环境中会出现问题？缺少上下文。这个互动式代码讲座将基础AI输出转化为强大的AWS解决方案，通过策略性上下文注入实现。观看实时编码如何将通用的"创建API"提示演变为生产就绪的无服务器架构。了解业务上下文、技术约束和AWS最佳实践如何显著改善AI结果。学习开发团队如何从代码审查者转变为上下文架构师。带走可操作的提示工程框架、质量门控和团队动态，将AI从开发负担转化为战略性AWS优势。停止与AI生成的代码作斗争——开始引导它。
